items.sentence: Tom and Mary looked as if they might start crying.
Tom and Mary looked at each other for a long time.
Tom and Mary picked some wildflowers by the river.
Tom could\'ve asked Mary for help, but he didn\'t.
Tom asked Mary to forgive him for what he\'d done.
Have you already finished your Christmas shopping?
How can you get a chicken bone out of your throat?
It\'s important to help people who are in trouble.
Let\'s finish this today, so we can rest tomorrow.
Did you find anything you\'d never noticed before?
